title: Dwayne Betts on Reading, Prison, and the Million Book Project
description: Author, lawyer, and poet Dwayne Betts talks about his time in prison and the power of reading with EconTalk host Russ Roberts. Betts is the founder of the Million Book Project, which aims to put a small library of great books in 1,000 U.S. prisons. Betts discusses his plans for the project and how reading helped him transform himself.
author: webmaster@econlib.org (EconTalk: Russ Roberts)
